# Euclidean Space {#def-euclidean-space}

An **$n$-dimensional Euclidean space**, denoted $\mathbb{E}^n$, is the [vector space](../algebra/def-vector-space.qmd) $\mathbb{R}^n$ equipped with the standard inner product and the induced [metric](def-metric-space.qmd). This makes it a finite-dimensional [Hilbert space](../analysis/def-hilbert-space.qmd).
